repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
A composite manuscript containing:
TBC (Indien 530a).
TBC (Indien 530b).
TBC (Indien 530c).
TBC (Indien 530d).
TBC (Indien 530e).
The Kalviyoḻukkam (Indien 530f).
A fragment of Tiruviḷaiyāṭal (Indien 530g).
Description based on the examination of the original manuscript (August 2021).
Dimensions assessed at the time of examination.

extent.measure: 1 + {1} + {1} + 1 + {1} + {2} + {1} (Indien 530a + Indien 530b + Indien 530c + Indien 530d + Indien 530e + Indien 530f + Indien 530g).

supportDesc.foliation: Library Arabic foliation 1-8 in black pencil. Reverse order compared to the logic of the bundle, followed here.
supportDesc.condition: Relatively good state of preservation. But some folios truncated, cracked.

additions.desc: Bnf shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 530 (front cover, recto).

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF. 780 x 35 mm.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 74, no. 530.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. 1866-. Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 120r, no. 530.

encodingDesc.p: General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.

revisionDesc.change: Revised by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Version 1, June 2022.
